General.Name: Wireless Power Amplifier Module Inc
General.Description: Wireless Power Amplifier Module Inc. supplies power amplifier modules for low power consumption mobile systems. It offers its products to the mobile system industry on various mobile communication applications, such as WiMAX, long-term evolution, and WCDMA. Wireless Power Amplifier Module Inc. was founded in 2006 and is based in Seongnam-si, South Korea.
